name: John Smith
biodata: John Smith is a classically trained chef with a passion for French cuisine...
method1: Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler.Whisk together sugar and eggs in a separate bowl.Combine melted chocolate mixture with sugar and egg mixture.Fold in flour until just combined.Pour batter into a greased baking dish and bake at 350°F for 25-30 minutes.
method2: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.Fry bacon until crispy.Beat eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture in a pan and cook until eggs are set.
method3: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.Fry bacon until crispy.Beat eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture in a pan and cook until eggs are set.
